answers.answer: Girl,  im about to be 35 weeks on Friday. And im so over this, im just uncomfortable, cant ever breathe right. I completely understand. We are almost at the finish line. Just a few weeks left of the misery lol and we get to see our babies
I know how you feel my little girl is putting me through so much pain I want her out I'll be 35 weeks next Tuesday but doctor says I might have to deliver early
37 weeks and I'm right there with you
37 weeks n I'm with you guys I just want to cry don't even knw why...

I'm 35 weeks I can't stand for more then an hour because it feels awful I feel tight and heavy all over my body. I have had infections and now they said I might have gestational diabetes I think that's what it's called :(
37weeks in 30min lol and i definitely feel you ladies

Almost 36 weeks and this week has been tough, just over it now. I want him to stay in for two more weeks then he can come because I want to have my baby shower first. I had my daughter at 37 weeks. So we'll see how long he stays in there for. I just got a cold a couple days ago to so that just adds onto being pregnant later.
I'm 36 weeks & so over it also..I'm ready to meet my baby boy...
37 feel same way but baby will come when ready. Plus, we are all almost at the finish line, we can do it! :) congrats mommas!

question: I'm 35+3 weeks and DYING to have this little boy. I HATE being pregnant and I just want to scream!! I wish he were coming already, but I'm not even dilated yet. I know, I know. Be patient. I *want* him to stay in as long as possible. And I also know that tomorrow I won't hate being pregnant. I didn't hate it yesterday or even a couple of hours ago. But I'm just. Ugh. Any other moms feel me on being done with it?
title: JUST WANT THIS BABY OUT OF ME!!
